info.title: Purchase Order
info.description: The service enables you to create purchase orders through an API call from a source system outside SAP S/4HANA. Furthermore, you can use the service to update, and delete existing purchase orders from the SAP S/4HANA system. The service contains header, item, account assignment, schedule line (including subcontracting), and pricing nodes. It is based on the OData Protocol and the information is sent in the request as a payload.

x-sap-shortText: Create, update or delete purchase orders using this synchronous service

get.summary: Gets the component details of all the subcontracting items, in all the POs in the system.
get.description: Gets the component details of all the subcontracting items, in all the purchase orders in the system. Note that if there are many purchase orders in the system, this operation might take a while.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

post.summary: Adds a subcontracting component line to an item in a purchase order.
post.description: Adds a subcontracting component line to an item in a purchase order. It is mandatory to provide the purchase order number "PurchaseOrder" and item number "PurchaseOrderItem" in the request body.

parameters.name: PurchaseOrder
parameters.description: Purchasing Document

parameters.name: PurchaseOrderItem
parameters.description: Purchasing Document Item

parameters.name: ScheduleLine
parameters.description: Delivery Schedule Line Counter

parameters.name: ReservationItem
parameters.description: Reservation Item

parameters.name: RecordType
parameters.description: Reservation Record Type

get.summary: Gets the component details of a particular item in a purchase order.
get.description: Gets the component details of a particular subcontracting item in a purchase order such as material, BOM item description, quantity so on using the purchase order number, item number, schedule line counter, reservation item and record type provided.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

patch.summary: Updates the subcontracting component details of a particular schedule line of an item in a purchase order.
patch.description: Updates the subcontracting component details of a particular schedule line of an item in a purchase order using the purchase order number, item number, sequence number of the schedule line, reservation item number and record type provided.

delete.summary: Deletes the subcontracting component details of a schedule line of an item in a purchase order.
delete.description: Deletes the subcontracting component details of a particular schedule line of an item in a purchase order using the purchase order number, item number, sequence number of the schedule line, reservation item number and record type provided.

post.summary: Adds new text or note to a purchase order item.
post.description: Adds new text or note to a purchase order item for example item text, delivery text. It is mandatory to pass the purchase order number "PurchaseOrder" and item number "PurchaseOrderItem" in the request body.

parameters.name: PurchaseOrder
parameters.description: Purchasing Document Number

parameters.name: PurchaseOrderItem
parameters.description: Item Number of Purchasing Document

parameters.name: TextObjectType
parameters.description: Text ID

parameters.name: Language
parameters.description: Language Key

get.summary: Gets the item texts/notes of a particular note type in a purchase order item.
get.description: Gets the item note of a particular note type in a purchase order item using the purchase order number, item number, text ID that identifies the type of note and language key provided. If the item note is not  available in the requested language, then it returns the note in the language in which it was created.

parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

patch.summary: Updates the item text or note of a particular text type in a purchase order item.
patch.description: Updates the item text or note of a particular text type in a purchase order item using the purchase order number, item number, text ID that identifies the type of text and language key provided.

delete.summary: Deletes the item text or note of a particular text type in a purchase order item.
delete.description: Deletes the item text or note of a particular text type in a purchase order item using the purchase order number, item number, text ID that identifies the type of text and language key provided.

parameters.name: PurchaseOrderItem
parameters.description: Item Number of Purchasing Document

parameters.name: AccountAssignmentNumber
parameters.description: Sequential Number of Account Assignment

get.summary: Gets the account assignment details of a particular accounting line of an item in a purchase order
get.description: Gets the account assignment details of a particular accounting line of an item in a purchase order, such as GL acocunt, cost center and so on using the purchase order number, item number and serial number of the accounting line provided.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

patch.summary: Updates the account assignment details of a particular accounting line of an item in a purchase order.
patch.description: Updates the account assignment details of a particular accounting line of an item in a purchase order, using the purchase order number, item number and serial number of the accounting line provided.

delete.summary: Deletes an accounting line of an item in a purchase order.
delete.description: Deletes a particular accounting line of an item in a purchase order, using the purchase order number, item number and serial number of the accounting line provided.

get.summary: Gets the pricing details of all the condition lines of all the items, in all the POs in the system.
get.description: Gets the pricing details of all the condition lines of all the items, in all the purchase orders in the system. Note that if there are many purchase orders in the system, this operation might take a while.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

post.summary: Adds a new condition line to an item in a purchase order.
post.description: Adds a new condition line to an item in a purchase order. Condition details like condition value, currency, order price unit and so on can be added. It is mandatory to provide the purchase order number "PurchaseOrder" and item number "PurchaseOrderItem" in the request body.

parameters.name: PurchaseOrder
parameters.description: Purchasing Document Number

parameters.name: PurchaseOrderItem
parameters.description: Item Number of Purchasing Document

parameters.name: PricingDocument
parameters.description: Number of the Document Condition

parameters.name: PricingDocumentItem
parameters.description: Condition item number

parameters.name: PricingProcedureStep
parameters.description: Step Number

parameters.name: PricingProcedureCounter
parameters.description: Condition Counter

get.summary: Gets the pricing details of a particular condition line of an item in a purchase order.
get.description: Gets the pricing details of a particular condition line of an item in a purchase order, such as condition value, unit of measure  so on using the purchase order number, item number, document condition number, document condition item number, condition sequence number and condition counter in pricing procedure of the condition line provided.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

patch.summary: Updates the pricing details of a particular condition line of an item in a purchase order.
patch.description: Updates the pricing details of a particular condition line of an item in a purchase order using the purchase order number, item number, document condition number, document condition item number, condition sequence number and condition counter in pricing procedure of the condition line provided.

delete.summary: Deletes the pricing details of a particular condition line of an item in a purchase order.
delete.description: Deletes the pricing details of a particular condition line of an item in a purchase order using the purchase order number, item number, document condition number, document condition item number, condition sequence number and condition counter in pricing procedure of the condition line provided.

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET A_POSubcontractingComponent HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--
